oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Requisition for stationery
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Requisition for stationery for Capt. Robert Cochran, Co. E, 9th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA while stationed at Nashville, Tennessee for the months of April, May, and June 1864. The 9th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA was raised in East Tennessee among loyalists. The 9th departed Nashville not long after this requisition was completed and moved into East Tennessee in pursuit of John Hunt Morgan. Stationery and writing utensils were essential for the paper work required to keep soldiers fed, clothed, and equipped.
